What causes Accessory navicular bone ?,"What causes of accessory navicular bone? The cause of accessory navicular bone is unknown. In some cases, the condition may be related to the development of flatfoot also known as pes planus, in other cases it may be related to repeated foot and ankle sprains.",GARD,Accessory navicular bone
